Interface Processor

All Superinterfaces:
TimerUser
All Known Implementing Classes:
MarsProcessor
public interface Processor
extends TimerUser

This interface contains the method of the MARS processor that can be invoked by the operating system. In particular, it enables the OS to set the interrupt handler for a particular interrupt; to set and get the program counter, to set and get the registers.

Method Summary
 int getPC()
          Returns the value of the program counter.
 int getRegister(int index)
          Returns the value contained in the specified register.
 void setInterruptHandler(int irqn, InterruptHandler handler)
          Set the interrupt handler to be used when an interrupt request with number irqn is generated.
 void setPC(int address)
          Changes the value of the program counter.
 void setRegister(int index, int value)
          Changes the value of the specified register.
 
Methods inherited from interface TimerUser
die, tick

Set the interrupt handler to be used when an interrupt request with number irqn is generated.
